column5: Our cottage is close to Georgetown, the airport, the university, and parks. You will have the feel of being in the country, but only 3 miles from the city of Georgetown. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets). We are located east of Georgetown on a private road. The view from the cottage is the city of Georgetown and Southwestern University. We are 1/2 a mile from the toll road and 30 minutes from Austin Bergstrom International Airport.
